participant_1.name: Isabella
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, with a passion for art and culture.
participant_1.background: i visit europe twice a year. i'm an art major in college. i love to cook paella. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus.

participant_2.background: my father drove a car for nascar. i am terrified of scorpions. i've a german shepherd named barnaby. my favorite color is grey.
